item.description:
This will be a special meeting to discuss important changes to our group. Among them will be a name and website change, and it's possible we'll make other changes depending on ideas that may come from this meeting.

This meeting will be held in a private home in Enfield.

The location will be made available to those planning on attending. Respond as normal, or to my personal email which is purpslerp@aol.com
item.name: Important Planning Meeting
